column2: an A.M. Eatery////The pancake flight wasn't what I imagined. While I should've guessed from the photos
column3: it was a complete sugar bomb. I like sweet
column4: but not THAT sweet. The syrup was everywhere combined with candied nuts and sweetened cream. It was just a lot. The pancakes themselves were good
column5: my favorite being the sweet potato
column6: but that is a one-time experience for me. It's just not something you would really want again IMO. The chicken sausage was solid. I hesitate to rate the pancakes
column7: because I know some people are really into them. I'm a definite dessert person
column8: but I don't like pure sugar
column9: so take that for what it's worth.
